tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: EXCLUSIVE The Expendables 2 - Debut Trailer
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
Almost every action hero in movie history is kicking ass in the new trailer for The Expendables 2! Watch it exclusively on IGN, with a special message from the legendary Sylvester Stallone himself!
Check out the official Expendables 2 site for more details: http://theexpendables2film.com/
For more Expendables 2 coverage, check out IGN: http://movies.ign.com/objects/085/085074.html
Want more exclusive movie trailers? Then subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
TAGS: "expendables 2" "expendables 2 trailer" "the expendables 2" "the expendables 2 trailer" "the expendables" "sylvester stallone" "terry crews" "jason statham" "jet li" "dolph lundgren" "randy couture" "bruce willis" "yu nan" "liam hemsworth" "chuck norris" jean claude van damme "action movie" "Sylvester Stallone (TV Actor)" "Chuck Norris (Film Actor)" "Bruce Willis (Film Actor)" "action movies" explosions guns "gun fights" shootouts "movie trailers" "movie trailer" trailer movies

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

thumbs up﻿ for wesley snipes in expendables 3!

Hey, we're raising funds for our film 'The Death of Jack Hamilton', a 1930s American gangster film centring on John Dillinger and his gang, based on the Stephen King short story of the same name. We've already raised $920 of the $3,000 that we're hoping to raise for the next block of shooting and we need your help! The trailer can be seen on﻿ our channel and if you have any﻿ spare﻿ coin lying around, you can donate here: sponsume.com/project/death-jac­k-hamilton-2012 Cheers!
